libfov
Enum Settings.ShapeType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<Settings.ShapeType>
      libfov.Settings.ShapeType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Settings.ShapeType>
Enclosing class:
Settings
public static enum Settings.ShapeType
extends java.lang.Enum<Settings.ShapeType>

Values for the shape setting.

Enum Constant Summary
FOV_SHAPE_CIRCLE
          Limit the FOV to a circle with radius R by calculating on-the-fly.
FOV_SHAPE_CIRCLE_PRECALCULATE
          (default) Limit the FOV to a circle with radius R by precalculating, which consumes more memory at the rate of 4*(R+2) bytes per R used in calls to fov_circle.
FOV_SHAPE_OCTAGON
          Limit the FOV to an octagon with maximum radius R.
FOV_SHAPE_SQUARE
          Limit the FOV to an RxR square.

Enum Constant Detail

FOV_SHAPE_CIRCLE_PRECALCULATE

public static final Settings.ShapeType FOV_SHAPE_CIRCLE_PRECALCULATE
(default) Limit the FOV to a circle with radius R by precalculating, which consumes more memory at the rate of 4*(R+2) bytes per R used in calls to fov_circle. Each radius is only calculated once so that it can be used again.

FOV_SHAPE_SQUARE

public static final Settings.ShapeType FOV_SHAPE_SQUARE
Limit the FOV to an RxR square.

FOV_SHAPE_CIRCLE

public static final Settings.ShapeType FOV_SHAPE_CIRCLE
Limit the FOV to a circle with radius R by calculating on-the-fly.

FOV_SHAPE_OCTAGON

public static final Settings.ShapeType FOV_SHAPE_OCTAGON
Limit the FOV to an octagon with maximum radius R.
